# Feature Engineering

### Time on Market `tom`, Price Difference `pdiff`, & Price Difference in Percentage `pdiff_perc`
```{r}
tem <- houseTC %>%
  mutate(tom = soldatdate - listedatdate,
         prdiff = soldatpr - listedatpr,
         prdiff_perc = (soldatpr - listedatpr)/listedatpr)
```
